Your force multiplier in international education

Adventus Drive is a more precise way to recruit. 
Our marketplace solutions help you unlock potential in your student pipeline.

your force multiplier in international education

Adventus Drive is a more precise way to recruit. Connect with more students, in more diverse countries, when it matters most.

TALK TO US

Go further with

We help you attract quality applications, diversify your student cohort and meet enrollment targets.

Elevate

your brand

Influence

channel partners

Analytics

to uncover insights

DOWNLOAD PRODUCT BROCHURE
Watch the video

Elevate

Get noticed by the
students you want

Our marketplace solutions help you boost global brand visibility, without even leaving your desk.

Influence

Target the best recruiters at scale

Keeping your institution top-of-mind means recruiters are more likely to recommend your programmes as they counsel their students.

Institution
Spotlights

  • Activate recruiters at scale with 100+ recruiters in attendance
  • Sessions recorded for on-demand training

EDMs &
notifications

  • Bespoke emails or sponsored articles to build brand and awareness
  • Timely on-platform notifications for immediate attention

100+

An audience of 100+ engaged recruiters on average per  webinar

Institution Spotlights

  • Activate recruiters at scale with 100+ recruiters in attendance
  • Sessions recorded for on-demand training

EDMs & notifications

  • Bespoke emails or sponsored articles to build brand and awareness
  • Push notifications reach our recruiter network for immediate attention

100+

An audience of 100+ engaged recruiters on average per  webinar

Analytics

Understand your performance

Dig deep into the data with Analytics. See how your institution compares to others, learn more about prospective students, and check on recruiter performance.

Funnel
Report

Unveil your applicant funnel, track student conversion and benchmark against competitors.

Recruiter
Ratings

Uncover recruiter performance insights such as offer success rate and student acceptance rate at both individual and comparative levels.

Applicant Pool
Dashboard

Get a clear picture of your leads with real time access to student application lists. Filtered by nationality, lodgement status and rankings.

Optimise your
performance at
every stage

Unveil your applicant funnel, track student conversion and benchmark against competitors.

Applicant Pool

Get a clear picture of your leads with real time access to student application lists. Filtered by nationality, lodgement status and rankings.

Optimise your
performance at
every stage

100+

An audience of 100+ engaged recruiters on average per webinar

Maximise your partnership with

Your force multiplier for
international recruitment

Trusted by 0+ institutions globally

FREQUENTLY ASKED

Your questions answered

How are you different to other EdTech players?

Our Partnerships team comprise of seasoned industry experts who have over 10 years of international education experience on average. Having held roles  at notable universities, they have been in your shoes and understand the challenges in international recruitment and admissions.

We also have an in-house quality assurance team to ensure only quality applicants reach you. We perform robust candidate, financial and reference checks to save you valuable time and repetitive admin.

Finally, we pass on 100% commission to recruiter agents meaning we remove bias from the equation. We genuinely care about the success of students and want to see them thrive by matching them to the right course every time. This means less turnover and churn for you.

I’m an institution. Does it cost anything to join?

It’s free to become a partner at Adventus! Course listing, quality assurance and access to recruiter agents around the globe is free as a partner.

If you want more influence and control over your student pipeline, you can consider our Adventus Drive membership. Click here to request a demo.

How many applications do you process per month?
We currently process over 7,000+ applications per month. Don’t miss out on receiving quality applications around the globe and partner with us today!
What other institutions are on the marketplace?
We have over 1,500+ institutions already on our marketplace getting quality students from around the globe. See the full list of institution partners here.  Don’t miss out and partner with us today.

Try Adventus.io for free

Sign up to the marketplace and start getting noticed today.

SIGN UP
